name: Task Detail
query:
SELECT 
    task_allocation_id AS `Task Allocation ID`,
    equipment_code AS `Equipment Code`,
    equipment_name AS `Equipment Name`,
    work_center AS `Work Center`,
    plant_section AS `Plant Section`,
    approver AS `Approver`,
    assigned_to AS `Assigned To`,
    status AS `Status`,
    activity AS `Activity`,
    parameter AS `Parameter`,
    parameter_type AS `Parameter Type`,
    plan_start_date AS `Plan Start Date`,
    plan_end_date AS `Plan End Date`,
    actual_start_date AS `Actual Start Date`,
    actual_end_date AS `Actual End Date`
FROM `tabTask Detail`;
